title: Morgana Jungle
body:
Hello fellow summoners,

Im a pretty hardcore morgana jungle player if i may say so better known by the name: THE LIVING NUJKKEEE.
However with this new jungle i feel like morgana jungle is way harder to play and lacks the early game clear, so i was thinking if you guys knew any ways to solve this issue and make morgana jungle stronger? maybe buff her W dmg and scalings while nerfing the E scaling since no one really needs that crap anyways i mean it does no dmg come on rito. also her ulti, i dont use it anyways for the dmg remove that dmg and add it on the W and i think we got ourselves a new jungle meta champ called morgana. while i know morgana jungle is very hard to play and it took me years to master i want you guys to be able to fully enjoy the potential morgana has as a jungle and hope you guys can do almost as well on her as i can. Also quadruple her passive vs jungle monsters.

Kind regards,
iWated

replies.body: What runes/masteries are you using? Perhaps skip krugs until you get your jungle item completed,or have a lot of points in your tormented soil.

Wow. I think you are right im also a high elo jungler and i know that morgana jungle is very weak. I really hope that they change her a bit or that they change the whole jungle so morgana jungle becomes a think.
